LanguageData.RiftRefugee: {PAWN_titleIndef} named {PAWN_nameDef} has appeared from a tear into the Rift nearby. If {PAWN_pronoun} survives the passage, {PAWN_pronoun} will be badly wounded.
LanguageData.RiftRefugee_Factionless: {PAWN_nameDef} is not affiliated with any faction. You can rescue {PAWN_objective} and hope {PAWN_pronoun} joins freely, or capture {PAWN_objective} for recruitment or slavery purposes.
LanguageData.RiftRefugee_Hostile: {PAWN_nameDef} is from your enemy {PAWN_factionName}. You can capture {PAWN_objective} for recruitment or slavery purposes.
LanguageData.RiftRefugee_NonHostile: {PAWN_nameDef} is from {PAWN_factionName}. If you rescue {PAWN_objective}, {PAWN_pronoun} may join freely. Otherwise, {PAWN_pronoun} will return home and spread goodwill between your factions.\n\nYou can also capture {PAWN_objective} for recruitment or slavery purposes, but this will anger {PAWN_possessive} faction.
LanguageData.ARR_ToxicShockText: {PAWN_nameDef} has gone into alchemical shock from ingesting too many potions! This will render them unconscious and can last up to half a day.
